page.title: 01AN INTRODUCTION TO OUR BLOCK
page.content: {INTRODUCTION. THE TWO SCHOOLS INVOLVED WERE ST.JULIE' S R.C.PRIMARY AND ECCLESTON LANE ENDS CONTROLLED PRIMARY SCHOOLS.THEY SPLIT THE BLOCK INTO TWO SECTIONS-ST.JULIE'S TOOK THE 4 NORTHERN SQUARES TOGETHER WITH THE 2 EASTERN SQUARES IN THE MIDDLE ROW -ECCLESTON LANE ENDS TOOK THE REST. PART OF PRESCOT LIES IN E.L.E.'S AREA AND WE WERE ATTRACTED BY THE LOCAL HISTORY OF THE TOWN.THE CLOCK INDUSTRY WHICH NO LONGER EXISTS IS REMEMBERED THROUGH THE PRESCOT CLOCK AND WATCH MUSEUM.NOT A GREAT MANY INTERESTING FACTS ARE AVAILABLE ABOUT THE PRESENT DAY IN THE SOUTHERN AND WESTERN SQUARES.GENERALLY THE 2 SOUTH-EASTERN SQUARES CONTAIN A MIXTURE OF RESIDENTIAL PROPERTY AND RESERVOIRS AND THE OTHER 4 SQUARES ARE TAKEN UP WITH AN ESTATE OF WOODLAND AND GRASSLA
